corrected state (x(k)): x(k)=x'(k)+K(k)*(z(k)-H*x'(k))

oclMat cv::ocl::KalmanFilter::gain

Kalman gain matrix (K(k)): K(k)=P'(k)*Ht*inv(H*P'(k)*Ht+R)
